articles.title: IBM to Replace 7800 Jobs with AI, Announces Hiring Freeze: Report - Times Now
articles.description: IBM CEO Arvind Krishna has stated that the company is looking into replacing around 30 percent of the workforce with AI. Along with this, the CEO has shared that IBM would be pausing its hiring for a while amid mass layoffs and advancing technology.
